children: , bhikkhave, abhiññāya satta dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame satta? Satisambojjhaṅgo…pe… upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo – rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.
innerText: 623. ‘‘Rāgassa , bhikkhave, abhiññāya satta dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame satta? Satisambojjhaṅgo…pe… upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo – rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya satta dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame
satta? Aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, asubhasaññā, ādīnavasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā – rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.
innerText: 624. ‘‘Rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya satta dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame satta? Aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, asubhasaññā, ādīnavasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā – rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.

children: , bhikkhave, abhiññāya satta dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame satta? Asubhasaññā, maraṇasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā – rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.
innerText: 625. ‘‘Rāgassa , bhikkhave, abhiññāya satta dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame satta? Asubhasaññā, maraṇasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā – rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Rāgassa, bhikkhave, pariññāya…pe… parikkhayāya… pahānāya… khayāya… vayāya… virāgāya… nirodhāya… cāgāya…pe… paṭinissaggāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.
innerText: 626-652. ‘‘Rāgassa, bhikkhave, pariññāya…pe… parikkhayāya… pahānāya… khayāya… vayāya… virāgāya… nirodhāya… cāgāya…pe… paṭinissaggāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dosassa…pe… mohassa… kodhassa… upanāhassa… makkhassa… paḷāsassa… issāya… macchariyassa… māyāya… sāṭheyyassa… thambhassa… sārambhassa… mānassa… atimānassa… madassa… pamādassa abhiññāya…pe… pariññāya… parikkhayāya… pahānāya… khayāya… vayāya… virāgāya… nirodhāya… cāgāya… paṭinissaggāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.
innerText: 653-1132. ‘‘Dosassa…pe… mohassa… kodhassa… upanāhassa… makkhassa… paḷāsassa… issāya… macchariyassa… māyāya… sāṭheyyassa… thambhassa… sārambhassa… mānassa… atimānassa… madassa… pamādassa abhiññāya…pe… pariññāya… parikkhayāya… pahānāya… khayāya… vayāya… virāgāya… nirodhāya… cāgāya… paṭinissaggāya ime satta dhammā bhāvetabbā’’ti.

children: bhagavā. Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
innerText: Idamavoca bhagavā. Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
